publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2092.2.1 Margo MacDonald: Expenses Scheme—As an amendment to amendment (S3M-2092.2) in the name of Tricia Marwick, in Annex 2 to the Resolution (the Schedule of Rates), leave out " 3.2.1 Annual limit on entitlement to reimbursement of staff salary costs £54,620 " and insert " 3.2.1 Annual limit on entitlement to reimbursement of staff salary costs £64,300
